name: Yeti Runners VR
description:
yeti runners is a game that uses the movement system from the popular game gorilla tag. There are many different servers(inf) for you to play in including private servers. The games main inspirations are from penguin paradise and gorilla tag which are both very popular games.

Rules ingame:

1. no slurs, racism or homophobia

2. treat others nicely

3. don't ruin the experience for others.

4. innapropriate/no name(s) will lead to a ban.

5.have fun
